title: Police open fire on recklessly driven lorry in Sooriyawewa
byline: The Sooriyawewa Police fired shots at a lorry that failed to stop when ordered during a traffic inspection at Meegahajadura.

title: Colombo-KKS train services to resume tomorrow
byline: Following the modernisation of the Maho-Anuradhapura stretch of the northern railway line, train services between Colombo and Kankesanthurai will resume tomorrow, October 28, the Sri Lanka Railway Department said.

title: Overstaying Russian couple arrested in Kandy
byline: A Russian couple was arrested by the Kandy Tourist Police for violating immigration laws and staying in the country without a visa.

title: Lewis century gifts West Indies consolation victory in Sri Lanka
byline: Opener Evin Lewis blazed his way to an unbeaten century to give the West Indies a consolation eight-wicket victory in Saturdayâ€™s rain-hit third and final ODI against Sri Lanka.

title: UK Police probe harassment claim at Sri Lankan High Commission amid suicide alert
byline: The UK police have made inquiries into a complaint regarding the alleged harassment of a domestic worker at the official residence of Sri Lankan High Commissioner in London Rohitha Bogollagama.
